title: The Fireman Who Loved Me (The Bachelor Firemen of San Gabriel #1
description:
Fearless, smoking hot, and single: meet the Bachelor Firemen of San Gabriel.
These firemen might be heroes, but it's their bad luck in love that makes
them legendary. News producer Melissa McGuire and Fire Captain Harry Brody
couldn't be more different, though they do have one thing in common: they're
both convinced they're perfectly wrong for each other. But when Melissa's
matchmaking grandmother wins her a date with Brody at a Bachelor auction . . .

Sparks fly. Passion flares. Heat rises. (You get the picture.) Add a curse, a
conniving nightly news anchor, a stunningly handsome daredevil fireman, a brave
little boy, a couple of exes, and one giant fire to the mix, and Melissa and
Brody's love may not be the only thing that burns.



The Fireman Who Loved Me
(The Bachelor Firemen of San Gabriel #1)
by Jennifer Bernard
ISBN: 0062088963
(ISBN13: 9780062088963)
Format: EPUB
Language: EN
Pages: 532
